title: fix(social): use main branch in Buffer image URLs
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Fixing the messenger
gist.blurb: Teaching our social bot to look for images in the right place so they don't disappear.
gist.summary: Updated the social media pipeline to reference image URLs from the main branch instead of temporary feature branches to prevent 404 errors in Buffer.
gist.impact: Ensures automated social media posts don't fail due to missing image links.
gist.visual_concept: A tiny bee mechanic fixing a broken link in a pipeline. The pipeline represents the flow of images to social media.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee mechanic fixing a broken pipe in a digital garden. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Text in pixel font: 'LINK FIXED'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
